item.title: 2011 "Blizzard"
item.dc:creator: Jessica Estes
item.content:encoded:
It may be time for us to get double-paned windows.

We have ice on the inside of our bedroom window today! I even chiseled out "hi".

Actually, in spite of icy windows and snow all around we are nice & warm inside, enjoying a snow day at home together

Jessica
